archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Transformation Assurance
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Establish an enterprise-wide transformation assurance policy framework, and an associated operational capability aimed at ensuring risks along change and transformation are recognized, owned, understood and actively managed to minimize financial and customer impact during digital transformation projects.
